bootstrap.onReady.then(function() {
        var sessionId   = parseInt('') || null,
            refreshRate = 15000;
        window.application = new Application({
            sessionUuid: null,
            strategy: 'exoclick',
            ajaxUrl     : '/ajax/::controller::.php?action=::action::',
            v2 : {
                ajaxUrl : '/json/::controller::/::action::'
            },
            device      : 'desktop',
            sessionId   : sessionId,
            geoStrategy : 'AmericanRegions',
            geoLanguage: 'en',
            variationsAb: null,

            isAuthenticated: false,
            request_token: '',
            happyHourPlatform: true,

                transactioncosts: "transaction costs",

            'file_too_large'      : "Picture is too large, maximum size is 5MB",

        winkMessages : [],

    /**

    var measurement_system = 'imperial';
            window.popup  = new Popup();
        window.popup.register({
            key             : 'alert',
            remoteTemplate : '/html/tpl/popup/alert.html',
            popupClasses    : 'small',
            variables       : {
                closeIconEnabled: false
            }
        });
    })
